Name: Spinning_Kid
About the game: In the game you have to rotate the level and guide the rabbit named 'KID'. The main character of KID is a crazy but talented inventor. Spinning_Kid is a sequel and addition to the game Gravity_Kid, with new gameplay. The rabbit continues to invent, in the upcoming journey, the rabbit is able to rotate the entire level 90 degrees. Spinning_Kid is an independent story with new adventures. You have to rotate the level, solve puzzles and, of course, collect carrots. Game features: Level Rotation Adventure Picking carrots Convenient management Difficult levels Physics, doors, keys and traps.
